Utility and Helper Functions¶

spyral.util.load_image(path, colorkey=None)[source]¶

Load an image from a filename. colorkey is an optional parameter, if it is set, then the colorkey of the image is set. If colorkey is -1, then the colorkey is automatically determined from the top left corner.

spyral.util.new_surface(size, size2=None)[source]¶

new_surface((width,height)) or new_surface(width, height) Returns a new surface guaranteed to work with spyral.
